article_title: Have We Covered All Of Obama's Lies?
article_text:
Lies told to the American people by President Barack Obama and his administration are in the hundreds.

So, it is no surprise that trust in government is at an all-time low. According to a CNN poll conducted in August of this year just 13 percent of Americans say the government can be trusted to do what is right always or most of the time, with just over three-quarters saying only some of the time and one in 10 saying they never trust the government.

Similarly, a Gallup Organization poll conducted in September, found slightly more than one in four Americans say they are satisfied with the way the nation is being governed, while nearly three in four are dissatisfied. Gallup found that 81 percent of those polled said they trusted government only some of the time or never.

More than 60 percent of voters “think Barack Obama lies to the country on important matters some or most of the time,” according to a Fox News poll from April this year. 37 percent think Obama lies “most of the time,” while another 24 percent say he lies “some of the time.” So it seems clear a major factor driving this dissatisfaction with the federal government is the culture of lies, lawlessness and corruption with which Barack Obama is poisoning our government.

Here are 12 examples of Obama lies that give cause on Election Day to oust the Democrats who have supported him, but which for some reason are almost entirely absent from establishment Republican campaigns this year.

Obama promised the “ most transparent administration in history ,” but it has shut out reporters from events, has denied Freedom of Information Act requests at record levels , and has destroyed government emails under investigation. Even the headline from Obama lackey Washington Post reads, “No, this isn’t the most transparent Administration ever.” " If you like your health plan, you'll be able to keep your health plan ." A private health insurance salesman who sold a plan like Obama sold Obamacare to the American public would be in jail for fraud. " You can keep your family doctor ." Rush Limbaugh wrote : “Barack Obama lied, it's been calculated, roughly 25 times over three years. ‘If you like your doctor, you can keep your doctor.’” " Families will save on [their health insurance] premiums ." Forbes Magazine September 2013 headline: “Obamacare Will Increase Health Spending By $7,450 for a Typical Family of Four.” What a lie! " Today I'm pledging to cut the deficit in half by the end of my first term ." Washington Examiner October 5, 2012 headline : “CBO makes it official — Obama broke deficit pledge.” " We reject the use of national security . . . to spy on citizens who are not suspected of crimes ." A March 2014 The Guardian headline reads, “Sorry, Mr. Obama, but that's not true.” Just ask NSA contractor-turned-leaker Edward Snowden. The attack on the embassy in Banghazi killing the U.S. ambassador and three other Americans on September 11, 2012 was spontaneous and cause by and anti-Muslim film made in America. This lie dishonors the four brave men who died. In selling Americans his $787 billion stimulus bill in 2010, Obama said it would create millions of shovel-ready jobs , but there were none. Obama lied. In May 2011, Obama said that the fence between Mexico and America was " basically complete ." However, only 5%, or 36 miles, were fenced. Obama lied again. The "Joe Wilson moment," in which Obama said that under Obamacare, no federal funds would be used to pay for abortions , but Wilson was right to say to the President at the State of the Union address, "You lie!" " I believe that marriage is the union between a man and a woman. For me as a Christian, it's also a sacred union ." Saddleback Church debate, August 2008. Then in May 2012, Obama endorsed same-sex marriage. He lied in his debate at Saddleback Church. The Daily Caller described it as “ doubling down ” when Obama told Bill O’Reilly that there was “ Not even a smidgen of corruption ” when the IRS illegally targeted Tea Party applicants for extra scrutiny and delayed tax-exempt status especially during Obama’s 2012 election campaign. His administration is corrupt, and he lied about it.

We know, with the hundreds of lies Barack Obama and his henchmen, such as Attorney General Eric Holder, have told the American people we have missed many in this short list of a dozen. Please use the comments section below to share the Obama lie you think is most important and should be part of this year's Republican midterm election campaign. Please give a short statement of the lie and a link or citation to the source and we will publish them in CHQ and share them with Republican candidates with a plea to put an end to the culture of lies, lawlessness and corruption with which Barack Obama has poisoned our government...
